info.description: Whether you need production services support, or want to learn more about our training programs, we'd love to hear from you.

faq.question: How much do your services cost?
faq.answer: Pricing varies depending on project scope, duration, and requirements. Contact us for a detailed quote tailored to your specific needs. We offer competitive rates while maintaining professional quality.

faq.question: How long does production typically take?
faq.answer: Timeline depends on project complexity. A simple NGO video might take 2-3 weeks, while a documentary could take several months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during consultation.

faq.question: Do you work with international crews?
faq.answer: Yes! We regularly provide film production services for international productions filming in Rwanda, including permits, logistics, local crew, and equipment.

faq.question: How can I apply for training programs?
faq.answer: Contact us through this form expressing your interest. We'll provide information about upcoming cohorts, application requirements, and available scholarships.

faq.question: Are training programs free?
faq.answer: As a social enterprise, we reinvest all profits from our commercial production services into training programs for Rwandan.

faq.question: What equipment do you have available?
faq.answer: We have professional cinema cameras, lighting kits, audio equipment, drones, and complete post-production facilities. Full equipment list available upon request.
